name: Gregory Zenin
description: I'm studying History and Russian at the University of Edinburgh. But more importantly, I'm just a guy who loves food and the planet which gives it to us!

name: Jack Bennett
description: Originally from Yorkshire and now studying History at the University of Edinburgh, I hope to see the world and make a change.
